GuestBuyerProfile.name: GuestBuyerProfile
GuestBuyerProfile.description: Represents a store's guest buyer profile, which allows unauthenticated buyers to browse the store.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Currency displayed to the guest buyer when theyâ€™re viewing the store.

Description.description: Detailed description of the profile. Includes information like which store the profile is used in.

LastReferencedDate.description: The last date and time when one or more of the fields were modified

LastViewedDate.description: The last date and time when one or more of the fields were viewed

Name.description: The name of the guest buyer profile. Including a reference to the store helps with later identification.
